sentences.en: Black clouds are an unmistakable sign of coming rain.
sentences.cn: 乌云是下雨的明显先兆.

sentences.en: He becomes still more unmistakable when we investigate further.
sentences.cn: 要是我们作进一步的研究,那就看得更加清楚.

sentences.en: He didn't give his name, but the voice was unmistakable.
sentences.cn: 他没留下姓名，但是那个声音是绝不会错的。

sentences.en: He tried to conceal his distress, but the tremor in his voice was unmistakable.
sentences.cn: 他尽力隐藏悲痛, 但是颤抖的声音却无疑表明了一切.

sentences.en: His work bears the unmistakable stamp of genius.
sentences.cn: 他的作品清清楚楚显示出他的天才.

sentences.en: It was surprising when the alkali spectra showed unmistakable doublets.
sentences.cn: 当碱金属光谱显示出不容怀疑的双线结构时,是令人惊奇的.

sentences.en: She was beautiful with that unmistakable beauty that only artists delight in.
sentences.cn: 她的美是一望而知的,只有艺术家才会倾倒的.

sentences.en: The cold, insolent voice held an unmistakable confidence.
sentences.cn: 那冷淡 、 无礼的声音带有一种坚定不移的信心.

sentences.en: The forecasts have since had to be toned down, as the economy has exhibited unmistakable signs of slowing.
sentences.cn: 该预测不得不在此后放低调子，因为经济已明白无误地显示出放缓的迹象。

sentences.en: The old man was showing unmistakable signs of senility.
The vital importance of the early recognition of perforating appendix is unmistakable.
sentences.cn: 能够早期辨明阑尾正在穿孔是极端重要的.

sentences.en: There is an unmistakable note of nostalgia in his voice when he looks back on the early years of the family business.
sentences.cn: 他回忆早些年的家族生意时，无疑是带着一种怀旧的语气的。

sentences.en: There was an unmistakable fault in the material.
While Sade's voice isn't technically brilliant it has a quality which is unmistakable.
sentences.cn: 虽然萨德的歌声从技巧方面说谈不上多出色，但很独特。

trans.tran_cn: 不会弄错的，不会误解的
